Summary 	Professional Background 
Since graduation in 1995, I worked 4 years in Bao-Steel Group and had built up solid experience in basic accounting, treasury and internal audit. After that, I worked as senior ERP consultant in Kingdee Software Group for 1.5 years, then joined different consulting companies as SAP consultant. During the 13 years’ practice in SAP, I took the lead in over 18 projects and obtained rich experience in varies kinds of industries solutions, relating to Steel, Auto, Chemicals & Petroleum, Cargo transportation, Food, FMCG, High-tech Electronic products and etc. 
	Accounting and Internal Control  
	Being engaged in basic accounting in Bao-Steel Group 
	Being finance head for 2 years in one of the affiliates 
	1 year’s experience in the Group’s internal bank, which was converted to the finance company of the Group  
	Being the leader in finance team in the Group’s ERP system implementation 
	Being involved in the draft of the Group’s financial management, internal audit standard, and strategic analysis reporting 
	Experience in SAP  
	15 years’ working experience in SAP system implementation, very strong in overall budget control， New general ledger, material ledger, fund management, group consolidation 
	Rich experience in profit centre accounting, overhead accounting, product costing, activity-based cost. 
	More than 15 SAP projects , 60% is MNC’s SAP projects 
	Excellent in module of FI & CO . such as New GL, Material ledger, product cost, cost centre accounting, profit centre accounting, internal order etc.  
	Master SEM & BI 
	Be familiar with MM, SD, PP and PS 
	Certified PA Consultant in PA partner Academy of SAP
